name: Full-Service Wedding Planning
long_detail: Our full-service wedding planning package is the ultimate luxury experience for couples who want a stress-free journey to their dream wedding. From the moment you say 'yes' to the final dance of the evening, we're here to bring your vision to life. We offer personalized wedding vision consultations, budget management, and cost-saving strategies. Our venue selection expertise ensures you'll find the perfect backdrop for your love story. We excel in vendor coordination and negotiation, securing the best professionals for your big day. Our detailed day-of timeline planning guarantees a seamless celebration. With unlimited communication and support, your wedding planning experience will be as memorable as the day itself.

name: Day-of Coordination
long_detail: Our day-of coordination service is designed to give you peace of mind on the most important day of your life. We take care of the final vendor confirmations, manage the wedding day timeline, and troubleshoot any unforeseen issues. Our emergency kit is equipped to handle any situation, ensuring a smooth and stress-free experience for you and your loved ones. From the rehearsal dinner coordination to a personalized emergency bridal kit and on-site supervision of ceremony and reception setups, we've got every detail covered.
key_features: Timeline management on the wedding day
Seamless coordination for a stress-free day

name: Destination Wedding Planning
long_detail: Imagine exchanging vows in a stunning international destination with the azure sea as your witness. Our destination wedding planning service specializes in creating unforgettable experiences in beautiful locations around the world. We excel in international destinations, have strong local vendor connections, and arrange travel and accommodation seamlessly. Cultural and logistical considerations are our expertise, ensuring that your wedding reflects your unique love story. We provide multilingual wedding coordination, assist with legal documentation, and curate exciting guest activities and excursions. Let us turn your destination wedding dreams into reality.

name: Wedding Photography
short_description: Capturing your love story through beautiful photographs
long_detail: Our team of professional photographers is dedicated to preserving every precious moment of your wedding day. We go beyond simply taking pictures; we tell your unique love story through our lens. Our coverage extends to all wedding events, ensuring no memory goes uncaptured. You'll receive high-resolution edited photos and an online gallery for easy sharing. Additionally, we offer an engagement photo session, beautifully designed albums, and digital photo rights for you to cherish forever.

name: Floral Design and Decor
long_detail: Transform your wedding venue into a floral wonderland with our exquisite designs and decor. From personalized floral arrangements to meticulous venue decoration and setup, we create a stunning atmosphere that complements your theme and style. Our expertise extends to coordinating with other decor elements, ensuring a cohesive and magical ambiance for your special day. We even offer floral preservation options so you can cherish the beauty forever.

name: Catering Services
short_description: Delicious cuisine for your wedding guests
long_detail: Indulge your guests with a culinary experience they won't forget. Our expert chefs craft a customized menu that tantalizes the senses, from delectable appetizers to mouthwatering desserts. We offer a wide range of food presentation and service options, ensuring your wedding feast is a feast for the eyes too. Our services include tasting sessions to finalize your menu, accommodating dietary restrictions, and professional waitstaff for impeccable service.

name: Live Entertainment
short_description: Energizing music and entertainment for your reception
long_detail: Turn your wedding reception into an unforgettable party with our live entertainment options. From live bands and performers to customized playlists and song requests, we keep the energy high and the dance floor packed. Our sound and lighting equipment create a mesmerizing ambiance, and our MC and DJ services ensure a seamless flow of entertainment. We offer themed entertainment options to make your night truly special.
special_features: Fireworks display for a grand entrance

name: Invitation Design
long_detail: Set the perfect tone for your wedding with beautifully designed invitations that reflect your style and theme. Our designers work closely with you to create bespoke invitations that leave a lasting impression on your guests. We offer a variety of paper and printing options, RSVP tracking and guest management, and even address printing and assembly for your convenience. Make your invitations truly special with wax seal and ribbon embellishments, custom envelope liners, and eco-friendly paper and printing choices.
key_features: Variety of paper and printing options
